src:
Cemoohan Fans yang Dianggap Wajar oleh Barcelona, Ada Apa?
06 Nov 2019, 05:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ernesto Valverde bisa memahami alasan kekecewaan sebagian besar fans Barcelona yang mencemooh tim pasca laga imbang 0-0 kontra Slavia Praha. Dia yakin fans hanya ingin membantu para pemain.
Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB, Barca harus puas berbagi poin dengan sang tamu, Slavia, pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20. Hasil ini terbilang buruk, mengingat perbedaan kekuatan kedua tim yang cukup jauh.
Permainan Barca memang belum benar-benar meyakinkan musim ini, khususnya di Liga Champions. Kemenangan 2-1 di kandang Slavia pada matchday 3 lalu pun terbilang beruntung, Barca terbantu gol bunuh diri lawan.
Sebab itu, mudah memahami kekecewaan fans yang tidak melihat tanda-tanda positif pada permainan Barca. Mengapa demikian?

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
What's the scoffing about fans that are deemed reasonable by Barcelona?
Nov 6, 2019, 05:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ernesto Valverde can understand the reason for the disappointment of most Barcelona fans who mocked the team after the 0-0 draw against Slavia Prague. He believes fans only want to help the players.
Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs, Barca had to settle for sharing points with the guest, Slavia, on Matchday 4 of Group F of the 2019/20 Champions League. This result is somewhat bad, considering the strength of the two teams is quite far.
Barca's game has not really been convincing this season, especially in the Champions League. 2-1 victory at home to Slavia on Matchday 3 and then was lucky, Barca helped own opponent's own goal.
Therefore, it's easy to understand the disappointment of fans who don't see positive signs in the Barca game. Why is that?

Read below, Bolaneters!
